description: Get all the great features of the legendary Meridian drysuit in a less expensive fabric. Hydrus 3L is a new waterproof-breathable fabric from Kokatat with similar performance, but less breathability than GORE-TEX®. It allows you to opt-in to the drysuit experience to enjoy comfort and protection that's far greater than a wetsuit. Integrated socks keep your feet dry and warm, while the relief zipper is a great convenience afloat and ashore.Made with Kokatat Hydrus 3L waterproof-breathable fabric.Self-draining punch-through neck and wrist neoprene over-cuffs.Latex neck and wrist gaskets.Self-draining zippered chest pocket with key lanyard.Competition-cut underarm for full paddling range of motion.Covered watersports entry zipper.Dual-adjustable overskirt with hook-and-loop compatible neoprene.Adjustable bungee drawcord at waist.Self-draining seat and knee patches.Hook-and-loop adjustable neoprene over-cuffs at ankles.Factory sealed seams.Relief zipper.Integrated Hydrus 3L socks.
name: Kokatat Hydrus Meridian Dry Suit - Men's
